name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $url
desc: Returns: An absolute URL that is used to identify this Topic when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this Topic is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the Topic. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URL that is used to identify this Topic when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this Topic is (or will be) published. The URL SHO

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifiers assigned to this Topic by the performer and/or other systems.  These identifiers remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Business identifiers assigned to this Topic by the performer and/or other systems.  These identifiers remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this Topic by the performer and/or other systems.  These identifiers remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $::version
desc: Returns: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the Topic when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the Topic author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions are orderable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the Topic when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the Topic author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might

name: $title
desc: Returns: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the Topic, for example, "admission".

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the Topic, for example, "admission".

name: $derivedFromCanonical
desc: Returns: The canonical URL pointing to another FHIR-defined Topic that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Topic.

name: $addderivedFromCanonical
desc: The canonical URL pointing to another FHIR-defined Topic that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Topic.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The canonical URL pointing to another FHIR-defined Topic that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Topic.

name: $derivedFromUri
desc: Returns: The URL pointing to an externally-defined subscription topic or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

name: $addderivedFromUri
desc: The URL pointing to an externally-defined subscription topic or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally-defined subscription topic or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The current state of the Topic.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The current state of the Topic.

name: $experimental
desc: Returns: A flag to indicate that this Topic is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A flag to indicate that this Topic is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

name: $date
desc: Returns: For draft definitions, indicates the date of initial creation.  For active definitions, represents the date of activation.  For withdrawn definitions, indicates the date of withdrawal.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: For draft definitions, indicates the date of initial creation.  For active definitions, represents the date of activation.  For withdrawn definitions, indicates the date of withdrawal.

name: $publisher
desc: Returns: Helps establish the "authority/credibility" of the Topic.  May also allow for contact.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Helps establish the "authority/credibility" of the Topic.  May also allow for contact.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the Topic from the consumer's perspective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the Topic from the consumer's perspective.

name: $useContext
desc: Returns: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching of code system definitions.

name: $adduseContext
desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching of code system definitions.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching of code system definitions.

name: $jurisdiction
desc: Returns: A jurisdiction in which the Topic is intended to be used.

name: $addjurisdiction
desc: A jurisdiction in which the Topic is intended to be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A jurisdiction in which the Topic is intended to be used.

name: $purpose
desc: Returns: Explains why this Topic is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Explains why this Topic is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

name: $copyright
desc: Returns: A copyright statement relating to the Topic and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the Topic.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the Topic and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the Topic.

name: $approvalDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the asset content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the asset content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

name: $lastReviewDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the asset content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after that, but doesn't change the original approval date.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the asset content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after that, but doesn't change the original approval date.

name: $effectivePeriod
desc: Returns: The period during which the Topic content was or is planned to be effective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The period during which the Topic content was or is planned to be effective.

name: $resourceTrigger
desc: Returns: The criteria for including updates to a nominated resource in the topic.  Thie criteria may be just a human readable description and/or a full FHIR search string or FHIRPath expression.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The criteria for including updates to a nominated resource in the topic.  Thie criteria may be just a human readable description and/or a full FHIR search string or FHIRPath expression.

name: $canFilterBy
desc: Returns: List of properties by which Subscriptions on the topic can be filtered.

name: $addcanFilterBy
desc: List of properties by which Subscriptions on the topic can be filtered.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: List of properties by which Subscriptions on the topic can be filtered.
